Description: "Token name. From :math:`4` to :math:`16` bytes (:math:`1` character can take up to :math:`4` bytes)."
"Token quantity: an integer value specified in the minimum fraction (“cents”)
column4: the real quantity multiplied by :math:`10^{decimals}`. From :math:`1` to :math:`9

column3: see the :ref:`reissue transaction <02_decentralchain:Reissue Transaction>` article. False for NFTs."

Description: "For the :ref:`smart asset <02_decentralchain:Smart Asset>`: the compiled :ref:`Asset script <03_ride-language:Asset Script>`
column4: base64 encoded. For the token without a script: null. The token issued without a script cannot be converted to a smart asset."

Description: "Token ID base58 encoded. The token ID is the same as the Issue transaction ID."
